## NRT Flood Test 

Libraries:

```{r}
library(stars)
library(earthdatalogin)
```

```{r}
edl_set_token()
```

```{r}
download_link <- "https://nrt3.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/api/v2/content/archives/MCDWD_L3_F3_NRT.A2023324.h09v06.061.tif"
x <- read_stars(download_link)
```
